srw_dc:dc.title: One who came back : the diary of a Jewish survivor /
srw_dc:dc.creator: Katz, Josef, 1918-

srw_dc:dc.description: Lübeck, Germany : January, 1933-December, 1941 -- Jungfernhof and Salispils, Latvia : December, 1941-April, 1942 -- Riga ghetto and Liepaja, Latvia : April, 1942-November, 1943 -- Kaiserwald, Latvia : November, 1943-fall, 1944 -- Stutthof, Poland : fall, 1944 -- Schichau dockyard, Poland : November, 1944-January, 1945 -- Death march in Germany : January-March, 1945 -- Liberation and Lübeck : March-April, 1945.
